mdRecord.dcterms:title: British colonies in North America, from the best authorities / Published Novr. 21, 1797 by C. Dilly & G.G. and J. Robinson, London
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dilly, Charles, 1739-1807
G. G. J. and J. Robinson (Paternoster-Row, London, England)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed for G.G. and J. Robinson, and J. Mawman (successor to Mr. Dilly), by S. Hamilton
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 18 x 23 cm. on sheet 22 x 26 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Plate XXIII" printed at upper left corner.
Appeared with this plate number in: William Guthrie's A new geographical historical and commercial grammar, and present state of the several kingdoms of the world, London, 1800.
Covers the area from Greenland to Asia north of the United States.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Canada--Maps--Early works to 1800.
